about.title: Annotate, scan, and visualize.
about.description: {AppName} is a free and open source tool for Windows, macOS, and Linux that allows you to annotate, scan, and visualize your beehive. It is designed to be easy to use and highly customizable.

features.title: Anything you need, all in one place.
features.description: {AppName} is packed with features that make monitoring your beehive a breeze. From annotating to scanning, it has everything you need to keep your beehive healthy and productive.

preview.title: See Images
preview.description: See images taken directly from the hive at any time and inspect them as you like. {AppName} supports all common image formats.

annotate.title: Annotate Cells
annotate.description: Whether you're a biologist who needs to annotate cells or a beekeeper who wants to keep track of your hive, {AppName} has you covered.

database.title: Database Storage
database.description: Along with local saving options, {AppName} enables you to store all your data in a secure and reliable database as well.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.description: Get detailed statistics about your hive and its cells. {AppName} provides you plots, graphs and tables to help you understand your hive better.

userModes.title: User Modes
userModes.description: Log in as a beekeeper or a biologist and get a personalized experience. {AppName} adapts to your needs and provides you with the tools you need.

security.title: Security
security.description: Your data is safe with {AppName}. We use the latest encryption technologies to ensure that your data is secure and protected and prevent unauthorized access.

themes.title: Themes
themes.description: Choose from a variety of themes to customize the look and feel of {AppName}. Whether you prefer a light or dark theme, we have you covered.

beehive.title: Beehive
beehive.description: Monitor your beehive with ease. {AppName} provides you a visual representation of your hive and its cells, so you can keep track of everything.

aiDetection.title: AI Detection
aiDetection.description: {AppName} uses cutting-edge AI technology to detect and analyze cells in your hive. Get accurate and reliable results every time.

team.title: Meet the team behind {AppName}.
team.description: {AppName} is developed and maintained by a team of passionate developers who are dedicated to creating the best possible experience for our users. Get to know the people behind the app and learn more about their backgrounds and expertise.

technologies.title: Built with the latest technologies.
technologies.description: {AppName} is built with the latest technologies to provide you with a fast, reliable, and secure experience. We use cutting-edge technologies to ensure that you have the best possible experience and seamless communication between every layer of our application.

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: Our frontend is built with React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. React allows us to create fast, interactive, and dynamic user interfaces that are easy to use and highly customizable.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: Our backend is built with Node.js, a powerful JavaScript runtime that allows us to build fast, scalable, and reliable server-side applications. Node.js enables us to handle a large number of requests and process data quickly and efficiently.

database.title: Database
database.description: Our database is built with MongoDB, a popular NoSQL database that is designed for scalability, flexibility, and performance. MongoDB allows us to store and retrieve data quickly and efficiently, making it ideal for our application.

ai.title: AI
ai.description: Our AI is built with TensorFlow, a popular machine learning library that is designed for building and training deep learning models. TensorFlow enables us to create accurate and reliable AI models that can detect and analyze cells in your hive.

demo.title: See {AppName} in action.
demo.description: Watch a demo of {AppName} to see how it works and what it can do for you. {AppName} is designed to be easy to use and highly customizable, so you can monitor your beehive with ease and keep track of everything that's happening inside.

download.title: Download {AppName}
download.donation_description: {AppName} is a community-driven project that depends on your support to grow and improve. Please consider purchasing {AppName} through the Microsoft Store or supporting us on GitHub if you use the classic installer.

microsoft_store.title: Download Files
microsoft_store.description: Purchasing {AppName} through the Microsoft Store helps support the developers and allows us to continue updating the app with new features and improvements.

preview.title: Download Insider Preview
preview.description: The preview version can be installed alongside the stable release and provides early access to new features and improvements.

self_signed.description: Don't have access to the Microsoft Store? Try our
